comments:

Changing bug owner from tptp.test-inbox@eclipse.org to the new default owner
Test.UI.
I need to verify this still happens with TPTP 4.1.

I verified that this is no longer a problem with either JUnit and manual tests
-- upon testing the manual case though, I found that the manual results point to
an inconclusive result while the JUnits indicate a success result.  It seems to
me they should both be pass results indicating that the test succeeded (even
though there was nothing in the test to actually test).

Another option is to make an additional state for this case or perhaps prevent
the test from running in the first place.

I will close this and open a new defect against the manual test client/runner
concerning the inconclusive result.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
